title: Computational Linguistics & Natural Language Processing books v1
description:
My CL/NLP library is rather small and messy at the moment, but hopefully may be of help to some. Some full books (Sells, Mitchell, Lambalgen & Hamm), some semi-complete books/drafts (Baayen, Johnson, Jurafsky & Martin) and a bunch of relevant articles and such. 

Possibly I'll upload a new version in future when I have more relevant pdf's. 
 <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4501119/Massive_Linguistics_Compilation" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4501119/Massive_Linguistics_Compilation</a> looks very good too, btw.
